snippet: The market indexes posted tiny gains as investors remained worried about an escalation of the conflict on the Ukraine-Russia border.
abstract: Stock market stabilizes and ends day with little change after sizable drop day earlier.
lead_paragraph: The market indexes posted tiny gains as investors remained worried about an escalation of the conflict on the Ukraine-Russia border.

headline.main: Investors Punish a Pair of Failed Mergers
headline.print_headline: Investors Punish a Pair of Failed Mergers
